official_title: A bill to amend title 31, United States Code, to allow United States Customs officials to search for currency in the course of their presently authorized search for contraband articles.

summary.text: Permits a customs officer to stop and search, without a search warrant, any vehicle, vessel, aircraft, or other conveyance, any envelope or other container, or any person entering or departing from the United States, on which or whom the officer has probable cause to believe there is being transported a monetary instrument for which a report is required.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 31, United States Code, to allow United States Customs officials to search for currency in the course of their presently authorized search for contraband articles.
